CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 21 reads: "The Courier Home Service Grand PRize WInners - Ralph Ellison, representative of Tumpson & Company, presenting MRs. Eva Roger one of the grand prizes - a Crosley Electric Dryer.  Inset, Mrs. Mary Tanner, winner of the Bendix Electric Range, another grand prize."
TitMainTitle: Ralph Ellison, standing between grand prize winners Mary Tanner on left, and Eva Roger on right, in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
